Vue 3 Marquee

🌟 A simple dynamic marquee component made for your Vue 3 applications

Quick Start →

⚡ Zero Dependencies

This is a simple Vue 3 component with no external dependencies. All the styling is done with pure CSS.

🌠 Dynamic content

You can put in any content that would like.

🙌 Easy to use

Only a single component with all the props you need.
